article_title: Why A Woman With Cancer Supports Hillary Clinton For President

article_metadata.description: “I’d rather have her working, as President, to make the ACA better,” she said. “I don’t think Bernie could get enough support to get a plan passed in Congress,” she said. “I don’t think he’s realistic.”
article_metadata.author: Elaine Schattner

og.description: “I’d rather have her working, as President, to make the ACA better,” she said. “I don’t think Bernie could get enough support to get a plan passed in Congress,” she said. “I don’t think he’s realistic.”
